entry.title: [CA][Dedicated Servers] - Manager
entry.content:
Jan 23, 14:17 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 23/01/2023 12:30 UTC 
End Time : 23/01/2023 13:51 UTC 
Root cause : Software issue
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jan 23, 13:59 UTC
Monitoring - Ongoing actions : The service is back to normal since 13:51 UTC.
Our teams are currently monitoring the situation.

Jan 23, 13:31 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 23/01/2023 12:30 UTC 
Service impact : Dedicated servers informations can't be displayed in the manager
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

entry.title: [CA][Customer Panel][Order funnel][API] - Backend maintenance
entry.content:
Jan 18, 10:49 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Jan 17, 05:08 UTC
Verifying - Update : The current maintenance has been completed. Our teams are monitoring the situation.

Jan 16, 22:30 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jan 16, 18:23 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 16/01/2023 22:30 UTC
End time : 17/01/2023 08:00 UTC
Service Impact : During the related maintenance, some features on the Canada API, as well as on the Canada Control Panel will be unavailable.
API Canada:
- Orders in CA/APAC zone will be unavailable.
- The retrieval of information about European service/IPs will be unavailable for customers.
- The listing of European IPs of customers will be unavailable.
- Customers IP listing will only list Canadian IPs.

Control Panel in Canada :
- The listing of services in the control panel will be unavailable.
- Ordering of new products not available from the CA/APAC website.
Related Maintenance : https://customer-service.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/h1qbgnmh0dr9
Service Improvement : OVHcloud will operate a maintenance on its internal infrastructure to improve its reliability.

entry.title: [EU][API] - New Service IP for OVHcloud API
entry.content:
Jan 3, 09:12 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Jan 3, 08:31 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jan 2, 12:05 UTC
Update - The current maintenance will be carried out as follows.
Start time : 03/01/2023 08:30 UTC
End time : 03/01/2023 09:00 UTC

Dec 2, 09:11 UTC
Scheduled - Following a coordination point with our teams, we will post a next update before each operation (minimum 24h each intervention). Please note that you must have made the connection changes as soon as possible to avoid any disruption in your services

Dec 1, 00:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Oct 27, 16:48 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 03/01/2023 07:00 UTC
End time : 03/01/2023 15:00 UTC
Service impact : During the migration, connection might be reset for one minute.
Service improvement : OVHcloud will change the service IP for its APIs (api.ovh.com, eu.api.ovh.com, eu.api.soyoustart.com, eu.api.kimsufi.com).
Customers using the OVHcloud APIs must verify that their outgoing firewalls is allowing connection to the new service IP: 141.95.186.223, on port 443.
